text:
Prerequisites
Before you start the installation, make sure your system meets these requirements:
Windows 10 or later / macOS Mojave or later
At least 4 GB of RAM
100 MB of free disk space
Internet connection for initial setup and updates
 
Step-by-Step Installation
 
Downloading the Installer
Visit the official Tech Innovator website.
Navigate to the 
Downloads
 section.
Click on the 
CV Parser Software
 link.
Choose the version compatible with your operating system.
Click 
Download
.
 
Installing the Software
Locate the downloaded installer file in your 
Downloads
 folder.
Double-click the file to start the installation process.
If prompted by a security warning, click 
Run
 to proceed.
Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the installation.
 
Initial Setup
Once the installation is complete, launch the Tech Innovator CV Parser from your desktop or applications folder.
The first time you run the software, you'll be asked to enter your license key. Find this in your purchase confirmation email.
Enter the key and click 
Activate
.
Complete any additional setup prompts, such as setting up user preferences.
 
Updating the Software
Open the CV Parser software.
Go to the 
Help
 menu and select 
Check for Updates
.
If an update is available, follow the prompts to download and install it.
 
Troubleshooting Common Issues
 
Installation Error
: Ensure you have sufficient permissions to install software on your system. Try running the installer as an administrator.
Activation Error
: Double-check that you've entered the license key correctly. If the problem persists, contact Tech Innovator support.
Software Won't Launch
: Restart your computer and try opening the software again. If it still doesn't work, reinstall the software.
 
For further assistance, please refer to the FAQ section on our website or reach out to our customer support team.
Title: Tech Innovator CV Parser Installation Guide
